title: Mangerica & Genica
content:
Hi Guys,

Just want to share my latest releases.

Mangerica

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414224133im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Poster_2_4392.png)
  
A sans serif, fresh and summery, tried to mix different influences (humanistic, script, geometric) into a consistent look  
 [https://www.behance.net/gallery/16573521/Mangerica-Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414224133/https:/www.behance.net/gallery/16573521/Mangerica-Typeface "https://www.behance.net/gallery/16573521/Mangerica-Typeface")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ndiscovered/mangerica/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414224133/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ndiscovered/mangerica/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ndiscovered/mangerica/")

Genica

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414224133im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sample_myfonts-04_4755.png)
  
A sort of brush display font, tryed to convey a happy feeling on this one too  
 [https://www.behance.net/gallery/12084847/Genica-Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414224133/https:/www.behance.net/gallery/12084847/Genica-Typeface "https://www.behance.net/gallery/12084847/Genica-Typeface")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ndiscovered/genica-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414224133/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ndiscovered/genica-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ndiscovered/genica-pro/")

Cheers
author: natenine

comments.content: Mangerica is very nice but Genica looks quite amazing!
